exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.notes: King of chest exercises. Not available at Planet Fitness (no free barbells).

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.notes: Excellent for upper chest. Available at home + Planet Fitness.

exercises.name: Chest Supported Row (Machine or Incline Bench)
exercises.notes: Planet Fitness has chest-supported row machine. Can also use incline bench + dumbbells.

exercises.name: Wide Grip Lat Pulldown
exercises.notes: Essential for lat width. Planet Fitness has this.

exercises.name: Cable Lateral Raise
exercises.notes: Superior to dumbbell lateral raises for constant tension.

exercises.name: Cable Y-Raise
exercises.notes: Targets upper/middle delts.

exercises.name: Overhead Cable Tricep Extension
exercises.notes: Requires cable station. Planet Fitness has these.

exercises.name: Skull Crusher (Lying Tricep Extension)
exercises.notes: Can do at home with dumbbells or at gym with barbell.

exercises.name: Face Away Bayesian Cable Curl
exercises.notes: Cable station required. Unique stretch-based bicep exercise.

exercises.name: Preacher Curl (Barbell/Dumbbell)
exercises.notes: Planet Fitness has preacher curl station.

exercises.name: Smith Machine Squat
exercises.notes: Planet Fitness has Smith machine. Excellent barbell squat alternative.

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat (Dumbbell)
exercises.notes: Can do at home or gym. Unilateral quad builder.

exercises.name: Walking Lunge (Dumbbell)
exercises.notes: Can be done with just bodyweight or with dumbbells. Excellent for glute development.

exercises.notes: Planet Fitness has this. Great for glute medius.
